svcsubproc.title: Cylinder Head Reassembly
svcsubproc.para: Clean valve faces and seats with a suitable cleaning solvent to remove all dirt or foreign material. Blow dry all new and used components using filtered compressed air .

note.para: Guides must be clean. Use a valve guide brush to clean guides.

step1.para: Dry valve guides with filtered compressed air.
Lubricate the inside diameter of the new valve stem seal with clean engine oil and install valve seal over valve guide until it stops.

note.para: Valve seal will not seat completely over valve guide by hand. Seals can be seated using a suitable deep socket and a rubber mallet to provide a positive contact with machined base.

figure.caption: Figure 173. Valve seal, spring, and retainer

step1.para: Place valve spring over valve stem seal.

figure.caption: Figure 174. Installation of valve retainer key

step1.para: Install a valve spring retainer on top of spring.
Attach "C" Type Valve Spring Compressor Glow Plug Sleeve Seat Wire Brush and compress the valve spring. Install the retainer keys and release valve spring compression tool.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, be sure retainer keys are correctly seated in each valve stem.

step1.para: After valve replacement, measure valve head recession relative to deck to confirm reconditioning. See Specifications .
